selections.name: Majestic Ga Ga
selections.reason: In superb form with back-to-back wins. Won comfortably by 1.4m last start and looks the class runner of the field.

selections.name: Luvaflair
selections.reason: Solid winner two starts back by over 13m. Failed to fire last time but has the ability to challenge the favorite if on song.

selections.name: Elish Star
selections.reason: Ran a very close 3rd (0.3m) last start at big odds. Drawn well and represents good value for exotics.

danger_horse.name: Aldebaran Sundown
danger_horse.reason: Consistent type who has placed in his last two starts. Rarely far away.

selections.name: Edge Eleven
selections.reason: Two-year-old on debut who has looked sharp in trials, winning two of them. Drawn the pole (1) which is a massive advantage.

selections.name: Seaside Serenade
selections.reason: Another debutant with a trial win under the belt. Drawn nicely in barrier 2 to challenge early.

selections.name: Le Jongleur
selections.reason: Showed ability winning a trial recently. The wide barrier is the main concern but has raw talent.

danger_horse.name: Rakaunui
danger_horse.reason: Placed in a recent trial and hails from a strong stable.

selections.name: Crowd Pleezer
selections.reason: Chasing a hat-trick of wins. Dominated last start winning by 11.5m. Hard to knock winning form despite the wide draw.

selections.name: Major Moves
selections.reason: Narrowly beaten (nose) last start. Consistent performer who will get a soft run from the second row.

selections.name: Arma Mushu
selections.reason: Last start winner who beat Major Moves. Must be respected again.

danger_horse.name: The Black Cherry
danger_horse.reason: Won three starts back. Drawn well to improve on recent midfield finishes.

selections.name: Idontwanabeapirate
selections.reason: Recent form is better than it looks on paper in a weak field. Won three starts back and wasn't disgraced last time.

selections.name: Slamma Alabama
selections.reason: Resuming from a spell. Trialled okay and drops into a winnable race.

selections.name: Philthejug
selections.reason: Generally around the mark. Can figure in the placings in this grade.

danger_horse.name: Im Eugene
danger_horse.reason: Has shown glimpses of form in the past. Field is weak enough for him to feature.

selections.name: Lillie Queen
selections.reason: Coming off a strong win by 2.2m. Looks well-placed to repeat the dose here.

selections.name: Wall Street Girl
selections.reason: Consistent mare who placed 3rd last start. Has the class to overcome the wide draw.

selections.name: Blockjorg
selections.reason: Forget last run. Won the start prior and drawn to get a good run.

danger_horse.name: Our Lililou
danger_horse.reason: Won two starts back. Capable of bouncing back from a poor showing last time.

selections.name: Stirup Iron Jack
selections.reason: Impressive winner last start by nearly 8m. Drawn perfectly to dictate or sit handy.

selections.name: Stapleton
selections.reason: Gritty winner last start. Tough horse who can do work and still finish off.

selections.name: Bealawyer
selections.reason: Won two starts back. Disappointed last time but drawn to bounce back.

danger_horse.name: You Fly With Me
danger_horse.reason: Drawn the ace. If he holds the lead or sits behind the leader, he's a threat.

selections.name: Star Casino
selections.reason: Class runner of the field. Even with the handicap, his recent form (3rd last start) suggests he is the one to beat.

selections.name: Our Major Jack
selections.reason: Racing in great heart with a win and a 2nd in his last two. Major player.

selections.name: Lukes Mistake
selections.reason: Won two starts back. Failed last time but can atone here.

danger_horse.name: I See Fire
danger_horse.reason: Front marker who could give a sight if allowed to bowl along in front.

selections.name: Como El Viento
selections.reason: Chasing a hat-trick. Won last two in style and looks a cut above this field despite the back row draw.

selections.name: Captain Said So
selections.reason: Runner-up last start and won the start prior. The main danger to the favorite.

selections.name: Classical Ellie
selections.reason: Consistent mare who ran a bold 2nd last time out.

danger_horse.name: Wicked Hustler
danger_horse.reason: Won three starts back. Can pop up at odds.

selections.name: Zuede
selections.reason: Last start winner by a nose. Ideally drawn to be right in the finish again.

selections.name: Lord Publisher
selections.reason: Ran a solid 2nd last start. Racing well and should be hitting the line hard.

selections.name: Tumblin Dice
selections.reason: Much improved effort to finish 2nd last start. Can go one better.
